commands.msg: Gain LP or take damage to resolve one of $name's effects?
options: $pref, then excavate cards until you excavate a $arch card, then add that card to your hand¬source=0¬add_lp=500¬excavate_until=$arch
label=Take 500 damage and send 1 "$arch" card from your Deck to your GY¬search(0, 2, [0], "$arch", -1, -1)¬add_lp=-500
